comment.author: 68512117@N02
comment._content:
Tom Harmon (3rd from left) on return to Lingling from long walkout after his P-38 Lightning was  shot down in combat near Lake Kukiang, 30-Oct-1943.  He is wearing clothing provided by local Chinese, as his uniform was burned in the bailout.  He served with the 51FG, 449FS. 
Harmon was an All-American football player at the University of Michigan, winning the 1940 Heisman Trophy, and played in the NFL with the L.A. Rams after the War.  His son, Mark Harmon, was a quarterback at UCLA and stars in the television series NCIS.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
